articles.title: After pay cut, another bad news for freshers in Wipro – Details - Times Now
articles.description: Nascent Information Technology Employees Senate (NITES) “strongly” condemned the actions of the IT firm towards its fresher employees. In February, Wipro announced that it won't be offering the lucrative salary offers to freshers as it has promised before.
